Nowdays, due to pandemic students tends to cheating due to their casual behaviour or due peer pressure .

Cheating 💡 Ideas are going viral on social media among students. These are forming basis of a bad future. The job providing companies should take measures on their exams that at least none of the question have direct answer on internet. This step as a filter work well for surviving in these economical conditions.
